title: Ping Connect
description: Ping Connect is a social media app with authentication, user feeds, and profile customization. Built with React, Redux, and Tailwind, it features interactive and responsive design.

title: Nihongo Journey Site
description: Designed a website on Japan, featuring Japanese language learning and tourist attractions, delivering an immersive user experience for cultural information and exploration.

title: Responsive UI
description: The Travel website inspires exploration with news, destinations, a blog, and contact sections. It celebrates nature's beauty and the joy of vacation trips, tourist adventures, and discovering new places around the world.

title: Universe Cosmos
description: The Universe Cosmos website explores space with sections on news, a simulator, articles, and contact. It emphasizes cosmic exploration and humanity's journey through the universe.

title: SpaceX Simulation
description: The SpaceX Simulation is a dynamic web app replicating SpaceXâ€™s site with interactive features, responsive design, and modern frontend tech.

title: Video Chat Application
description: This video chat application enables live video conversations, user authentication, and data management, providing a secure and interactive communication platform.

title: Shortify
description: Shortify is a user-friendly web app for URL shortening with analytics and a user dashboard. Built with the MERN stack, it includes authentication, MongoDB storage, and a responsive design.
